instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Public Sans' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard layout.
The File Upload area must be the 'Hero' element - large, spacious (p-20), and centrally aligned initially.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any technical data like Confidence Score (e.g., '0.98'), File Size, or JSON previews.
Do not use default Shadcn shadows. Flatten the design using 'shadow-none' and rely on 'border-zinc-200'.
For the 'Processing' state, use a subtle pulse animation on the card border or a thin progress bar.
Ensure the 'History' panel uses a dense list layout (row-based) rather than large cards.
Use the provided abstract image as a subtle background for the 'Empty State' of the history panel or upload area.
Strictly follow the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' color archetype: White background, Black text, Blue accents.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry where possible.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
